GSP33mbrahsiu:11: parāṃ ca devatāṃ guṇābhidhānalakṣaṇayā stutyā kāyavāṅmanaḥprahvatālakṣaṇayā ca praṇatyā pūjayati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:17: rāganibandhanā ca pravṛttiḥ saṃsārabījamiti na muktaye syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:20: tasmātsakaladuḥkhātige brahmatattve duḥkhebhya udvignaḥ sukhebhyaśca vītarāgaḥ pravartamāno mucyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:47: yatraiva kāmaḥ sa eva sukhayati viṣayaḥ, netaraḥ /

GSP33mbrahsiu:70: kāmābhāvamātre ca sukhe 'kāmitaviṣayopabhoge na bhogāvasthāyāḥ pūrvāpare avasthe bhidyeyātām /

GSP33mbrahsiu:80: yāpi kācidananubhūte 'pi jātiviśeṣabhājāṃ kāmapravṛttiḥ sāpi prāgbhavīyānubhavanibandhanā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:101: tattvadarśanavaimalyāttu tattve cetasaḥ prasādo 'bhirucirabhīcchā na rāgapakṣe vyavasthāpyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:103: anyathā sarvaduḥkhātige 'pi tattve taddveṣanibandhanā pravṛttiriti saṃsārānubandhaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:104: api ca dṛṣṭaparotkarṣarāgibhyo 'pīndriyajaya upadiśyate sādhanatvena kāmādityāgātmakaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:114: kartṛkarmabhāvaśca na kriyāṃ karaṇaṃ cāntareṇa yataḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:123: pramāṇasya phalamarthāntaramanarthāntaraṃ vā sarvaparīkṣakaiḥ pratijñāyate prajñāyate ca /

GSP33mbrahsiu:137: na hyātmāsaṃvedyaḥ phale viṣaye cānusaṃdhātuṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:148: tathā hi sarvakarmapratyastamayahetuka eva sa ucyate ‘
GSP33mbrahsiu:161: na hyekasya dve rūpe yujyete, virodhāt /

GSP33mbrahsiu:196: evaṃ ca laukikānanda etasya mātreti yujyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:258: sā hi sādhyasādhanādivibhāgaṃ nivartayantī sarvatra cātmābhimānamāvirbhāvayantī tadvirodhinī syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:271: ekasminnapyātmani sarvagate śarīraparimāṇe 'ṇuparimāṇe vā kalpitabhedanibandhanā bhogavyavasthā dṛśyate ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:275: na hi pādasya śiraso vā vedanayābhisaṃbandhaḥ, ajñatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:282: api ca tatrāpi na pradeśaḥ pradeśāntaravedanāmanusaṃdadhāti,
GSP33mbrahsiu:287: eko 'pyātmā pradeśaiḥ sukhaduḥkhādibhiryujyamānastatra baddha iva itaratra mukta iva ca gamyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:288: yathā malīmase darpaṇatale malīmasaṃ mukhaṃ viśuddhe viśuddhaṃ darpaṇarahitaṃ ca gamyamānaṃ tadupādhidoṣāsaṃpṛktam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:290: kalpanā pratipattuḥ pratyayasya dharmo na vastu vyavasthāpayitumalam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:291: na khalu pratipattuḥ pratyayamanu viparivartante vastūni /
GSP33mbrahsiu:330: citestu vibhaktamasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ tayā cetyata iti duravagamam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:338: anādinidhanatve hi nāpaneyaṃ nopaneyaṃ vā kiñcidastīti tadarthāni śāstrāṇi tadarthāśca pravṛttayo vyarthāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:347: na ca śāstrāṇāṃ muktyarthānāṃ ca pravṛttīnāṃ vaiyarthyam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:354: na vā syāt, tatra kiṃ nivartyam? atha matam ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:363: yasya tattvāgrahaṇaṃ brahmaṇi prayatnalabhyayā vidyayā nivartyeta /
GSP33mbrahsiu:367: tasya brahmaṇaḥ svabhāvaścetsa nityaḥ kathaṃ nivartyeta?
GSP33mbrahsiu:454: na hi māyākārasya vividhaṃ prapañcaṃ [KKS_11] darśayato 'ṅgasākalyavaikalyavibhāgena rāgadveṣavibhāgaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:455: citrapustādikṛtāṃ vā vikalāvikalādibhedena citrāṇi tāni tāni kurvatām,

GSP33mbrahsiu:482: api ca pārthivānāmaṇūnāṃ śyāmatānādiḥ pākajena varṇena nivartyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:510: avyatireke 'pi ca brahmaṇo jīvānāṃ bimbapratibimbavadvidyāvidyāvyavasthā vyākhyātā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:516: sa ca sāmānyena bhedadarśanaṃ pravilāpayannātmanāpi pravilīyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:519: tathā ca tasminnapi pravilīne svacchaḥ pariśuddho 'syātmā prakāśate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:520: yathā rajaḥsamparkakaluṣitamudakaṃ dravyaviśeṣacūrṇarajaḥ prakṣiptaṃ rajontarāṇi saṃharatsvayamapi saṃhriyamāṇaṃ svacchāṃ svarūpāvasthāmupanayati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:521: evameva śravaṇādibhirbhedadarśane pravilīyamāne viśeṣābhāvāttadgate ca bhede,
GSP33mbrahsiu:525: yathā ghaṭādibhede tadākāśaṃ pariśuddhaṃ paramākāśameva bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:532: yathā payaḥ payo jarayati [KKS_13] svayaṃ ca jīryati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:533: yathā ca viṣaṃ viṣāntaraṃ śamayati svayaṃ ca śāmyati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:556: ‘tameva bhāntamanubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvamidaṃ vibhāti'; iti /

GSP33mbrahsiu:572: bhavati hi māyā prīterbhayasya ca nimittam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:582: api ca abhedadarśanopāyā api na svarūpeṇa mithyā,
GSP33mbrahsiu:593: īdṛśīṃ rekhāṃ dṛṣṭvāyaṃ varṇaḥ smartavya iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:596: bālā hi rekhāsu varṇatvenaiva vyutpādyante loke 'bhedena ca vyapadeśaḥ ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:605: yasyaiva kṣaṇikajñānamātmā tasyaiva tūpaneyāpaneyāsambhavānmokṣaśostrāṇāṃ muktyarthānāṃ ca pravṛttīnāṃ vaiyarthyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:624: api cābhyupagamyāpi kṣaṇikaṃ vijñānamanādinidhanāyā eva santatermuktisaṃsārāvabhyupetau /
GSP33mbrahsiu:628: sa hyantyaḥ kṣaṇaḥ kiñcitkāryamārabheta vā, na vā /

GSP33mbrahsiu:656: sakarmako hi jānātyartho nāsati karmasambandhe yujyate /

GSP33mbrahsiu:667: evamayaṃ puruṣo bhogāyatanaśarīrastho bhogasādhanendriyopanītān śabdādīn bhuṅkte,

GSP33mbrahsiu:688: kaśca sarvataḥ preyasa ātmano 'bhāvamabhikāṅkṣedityapuruṣārtho mokṣaḥ syāt /

GSP33mbrahsiu:712: yathā devatāyāḥ sākṣātpūjāsambhavāttallāñchane dāruṇyaśmani vā pūjāvidhānaṃ tadbuddhyā,

GSP33mbrahsiu:766: tathā ca tadrūpopagrāhyaṃ jagattadvivarta iti pratīmaḥ /

GSP33mbrahsiu:800: sarvathā vāgrūpādhīno jñeyabodha iti sarvaṃ jñeyaṃ vāgrūpānvitaṃ gamyata iti tadvikārastadvivarto vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:813: ‘yasmin vikriyamāṇe 'pi tattvaṃ na vihanyate tadapi nityam'; iti /

GSP33mbrahsiu:908: ānantyādeva tarhi na sarvātmanopalabdhiḥ saṃbhavatīti guṇapuruṣānyatākhyātimato 'pi punarāvṛttiḥ saṃbhāvyeta /
GSP33mbrahsiu:909: avidyāpūrvakarmanibandhanatve 'pyanādau saṃsāre 'nantatvātkarmaṇāmaniyatavipākakālatvācca pratisargāvasthāyā iva muktyavasthāyā api pratyudāvṛttibhayaṃ na vyāvartate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:910: avidyānibandhanatve 'pi tasyā nirhetutvānniṣprayojanatvācca pravṛttestathaiva punaḥ punaḥ pravṛttiḥ kena vāryate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:912: svatantre tu brahmaṇi vibhaktānāṃ jīvānāṃ dehendriyopabhogahetāvavibhaktānāṃ vā vibhajya bhogādibhirhetubhirna punardehādibhedo na sambhāvyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:913: svatantro hi krīḍayā svātantryakhyāpanena [KKS_22] vā svabhāvena vā punarbadhnīyāllaukika iveśvaraḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:916: tathāpi karmaṇāmānantyādvipākakālaniyamābhāvācca kalpaśatātikrame 'pi prāptavipākakālebhyaḥ karmabhyaḥ punarbandhaḥ sambhāvyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:976: pravṛttyā hyanumāyārthapratyayaṃ tatra śabdasya sāmarthyapratītiḥ (@pratīteḥ -- edition)
GSP33mbrahsiu:977: tathā ca na pravṛttisambandharahiteṣvartheṣu śabdānāṃ śaktirgamyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:978: tathā satyanavagatasāmarthyāḥ śabdā bhūte 'rthe kathaṃ tadavagamayeyuḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:984: atyantāparidṛṣṭastu padādanavagamyamānaḥ padārthasaṃsargātmake vākyārthe na guṇatvena pradhānatvena vānupraveśamarhati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:985: api ca pralīnanikhilāvacchedaṃ tattvamagocara eva pratipatteḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1000: na ca sukhī bhava iti tatra pravṛttirupadiśyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1009: na ca bhūtārthaparyavasitasyaiva śabdasya [KKS_24] prayojanavattve pravṛttyavadhirvyāpāraḥ kalpayituṃ śakyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1016: tathā durjanavacanānyapriyākhyānāni viṣādaprayojanāni na pravṛttiṃ nivṛttiṃ vopadiśanti pūrveṇaiva nyāyena /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1017: tathā rajjuveṣṭitasya sarpaveṣṭitamātmānaṃ manyamānasya bhayanivṛttaye tattvākhyānaṃ dṛśyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1021: yatra niyogārthaṃ pratibudhya puruṣo buddhipūrvaṃ niyogasāmarthyādicchayā vā punaḥ pravartate nivartate vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1023: na ca bhayanivṛttau puruṣārthatvātsvayaṃpravṛttaḥ puruṣo niyojyaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1028: tathā dūradeśavṛttāntākhyānāni pṛṣṭavatāṃ kutūhalināmautsukyanivṛttyarthāni bhūtārthaparyavasitāni na hānāyopādānāya vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1035: śabdādbhūtamarthaṃ pratipadya tasya pramāṇāntarāvagatāmupakārahetutāmapakārahetutāṃ vā saṃsmṛtya icchayā pravartate dveṣeṇa nivartate vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1036: nanu prayoktā buddhipūrvakārī śrotuḥ pravṛttyarthaṃ nivṛttyarthaṃ vā vacanaṃ prayuṅkte /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1038: idaṃ hi tatra prayoktavyaṃ na prayujyate ‘
GSP33mbrahsiu:1043: bhūtārthaparyavasitasyāpi vacaso bhūtārthāvagamamukhena pravṛttinivṛttyaṅgabhāvo yato na vyāhanyate pratyakṣādīnāmiva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1044: bhūtārthapramāparisamāptavyāpṛtayaḥ pratyakṣādayo mātrayāpyagocarīkṛtapravṛttinivṛttayo na pravṛttinivṛttyaṅgabhāvaṃ [KKS_25] jahati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1048: anyathā nidhiprāptidvārikā nānāvidhapuruṣārthāvāptirapi tasyābhisaṃhiteti śabdārthaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1049: yadā ca pravṛttiṃ nivṛttiṃ vābhisaṃdhāya kiñcitpratyakṣādibhirjijñāsyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1059_1: vyutpannavibhaktyarthaśca yatpacatyarthe karaṇaṃ paśyati tasya kāṣṭhaprātipadikārthatāṃ pratipadyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1060: tathā harṣaviṣādāśvāsaprayojanebhyaḥ tattvākhyānebhyo harṣādinimitteṣu bhavati vyutpattiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1066: putraste jātaḥ'itīdaṃ vākyamāptena tatra putrajanmani prayuktamiti pratipadyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1075: tatra svārthamātraparyavasāne vākyārthapratyayābhāvaḥ prayogavaiyarthyaṃ ca syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1084: api ca sarveṣāṃ kāryānvayitve parasparaṃ padārthānāmanabhisambandhaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1091: kimataḥ? asti niyogātiriktārthānvaye 'pi padasya sāmarthyaṃ niyogānapekṣaṃ ca,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1093: na ca niyogākāṅkṣānibandhanaḥ saṃsarga iti pratipādayiṣyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1094: anadhigatamapi ramāṇāntareṇānadhigatasambandhaṃ ca svaśabdena śakyaṃ śabdena nirūpayituṃ viśeṣapratiṣedhamukhena,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1110: atha cādṛṣṭasaṃsthānabhedopaplavavivekamapi buddhyā bhedāpohadvāreṇa svayaṃ pratīyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1119: kiṃ kṛtsna āmnāyo bhedaprapañcavilayamukhena brahma nirūpayati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1128: tathā vidhiniṣedhacodanāsvapi naisargikīṇāṃ rāgādinibandhanānāṃ pravṛttīnāṃ pravilayaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1140: anye (Ms A; anye tu edition) manyante ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1142: karmabhistu kṛtakāmanibarhaṇaḥ sahasrasaṃvatsaraparyantaiḥ prājāpatyātpadātparamādvaitamātmānaṃ pratipadyata iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1145: pṛthakkāryā eva santaḥ karmavidhaya ātmajñānādhikāramavatārayanti puruṣam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1150: ‘yena kenacana yajetāpi darvīhomenānupahatamanā eva bhavati'; iti ca /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1156: anye tu parasparavirodhinoḥ karmātmajñānayoḥ dvaitādvaitaviṣayatvenāsaṃbandha eveti manyante /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1165: api ca sarvavidhiniṣedhānāṃ nāmarūpapravilayakāryāpavargitve jantūnāmabhyudayavinipātā akarmanimittā ākasmikāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1175: tatra ca nairākāṅkṣye kathamanyānupraveśaḥ? atha matam ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1185: [KKS_29] yatpratigrāmaṃ vaktuḥ śrotuśca satyāmarthaprāptau pramāṇāntareṇānadhigate paradeśaprāptyabhiprāye pūrvopadeśān pūrvārthāneva pārśvasthāḥ pratipattāraḥ pratipadyante,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1193: tatra paradeśaprāptiparatāyāṃ tu na niyogatastatra gamanam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1212: na ca sāṅgrahaṇyāḥ sevāyāśca grāmopāyatve kaścidvirodhaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1214: tatra yugapatkrameṇa vā phalabhūmārthinaḥ sevāsāṅgrahaṇyāvanutiṣṭhataḥ ko virodhaḥ?
GSP33mbrahsiu:1215: api ca sakaladṛṣṭārthapravṛttinirodhe niyoganiṣṭhā api pravṛttayo nirudhyeran,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1217: api ca tulye kāmopāyatve dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthapravṛttyorna na viśeṣo rāgādyākṣiptatve /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1220: tathā ca prapañcābhiniveśe tulye kena viśeṣeṇa ekātmānuguṇyaṃ bhajate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1226: tulyakāryanibandhanatvācca virodhādyā [KKS_30] nirodhāśaṅkā sā dūrato nirastāvakāśā syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1227: atha kāmaprāptyā karmavidhayaḥ kāmān pravilāpayanto jñānādhikārānuguṇāḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1229: 'yadā sarve pramucyate kāmā ye 'sya hṛdi śritāḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1235: kalayāpi cetkāmairmanaḥ saṃspṛśyate hriyata eva hāribhiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1238: ‘bhogābhyāsamanu vivardhante rāgāḥ kauśalāni cendriyāṇām'; iti ca /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1258: dvitīyo 'pi kalpo varṇitādeva kāmānāṃ kāmanibarhaṇasāmarthyābhāvātsvakāryanirākāṅkṣāṇāṃ cānyānupraveśe pramāṇabhāvādasamañjasaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1264: tatra hi prakaraṇātprakṛtakarmāpūrvalakṣaṇāparo brīhiśabdaḥ svasvarūpa ānarthakyātprakṛtāpūrvasambandhaṃ bodhayati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1271: tathā cājñāte pārārthye yā nāma phalaśrutirna sārthavādinī bhavatīti pṛthagadhikāratvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1302: tajjñānasya kathaṃ karmapravṛttirdṛṣṭaṃ prayojanaṃ syāt? tathā hi ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1303: brahmānandamekamadvayamātmānaṃ vijānataḥ kimarthaṃ kathaṃ vā pravṛttiḥ syāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1306: yadeva vidyayā karoti śraddhayopaniṣadā [KKS_32] tadeva vīryavattaraṃ bhavati'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1307: tathā ‘yo vā etadakṣaraṃ gārgyaviditvāsmiṃlloke juhoti'ityupakramya yāgādiphalasyāntavattādarśanena brahmavidyāyāstādarthyaṃ darśitam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1340: atha bandhahetuvicchedaḥ sādhya iti tasmin vicchinne tadabhāvānmucyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1353: tattvāgrahaṇanimitto viparyāso nimittanivṛttau svayameva nivartiṣyate, tacca na /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1360: ato viparyayajñānasya nivṛttirvidyayā sādhyeti tatra jñānasya sahakāryapekṣā syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1362: na khalu śuktikādiṣu viparyāsapurassaraṃ samupajātasamyagjñānāstannivṛttaye pṛthak prayatante,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1364: yato virodhibhāvāntarotpāda eva pūrvapradhvaṃsaḥ, na śūnyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1374: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭe parāvare'; //
GSP33mbrahsiu:1389: pramiteḥ pratyakṣaparatvāttatra ca nairākāṅkṣyāttadarthyata iti cet,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1415: anadhigata eva tarhi śabdena pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1429: kathaṃ khalvavagatabrahmātmabhāvo viditātmayāthātathyo mithyādarśananimittairdharmairyujyate? śrūyate ca ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1435: tathā ‘aśarīraṃ vāva santaṃ na priyāpriye spṛśataḥ'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1450: abhyāso hi saṃskāraṃ draḍhayan pūrvasaṃskāraṃ pratibadhya svakāryaṃ santanoti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1462: draḍhiyasi ca mithyādarśanaje saṃskāre niścayā api mithyārthā bhavanti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1465: tathā pramitarajjubhāvāyā api rajjvāḥ pramāṇānanusandhāne sarpabhrāntyā bhayadarśanam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1466: tasmājjāte 'pi pramāṇāttattvadarśane anādimithyādarśanābhyāsapariniṣpannasya draḍhīyasaḥ saṃskārasyābhibhavāyocchedāya vā tattvadarśanābhyāsaṃ manyante /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1477: api cānyathāniścaye 'pi raṅgagatā bharatādayo mithyāvabhāsena śokabhayādihetavaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1478: niścite 'pi guḍasya mādhurye tatra mithyātiktāvabhāso 'vitatha iva duḥkhayati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1502: pratipannagārhasthyasyātmavidyayaiva kṛtakṛtyatāṃ manvānasya ṛṇāpākaraṇaṃ pratyanādṛtasya vihitākaraṇanimittasya pāpmano vidyodayapratibandhṛtvaṃ darśayati ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1521: tathā cordhvaretasāṃ cāśramiṇāṃ vināpi tairviśuddhavidyodaya iṣyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1523: sādhanaviśeṣāddhi sā kṣipraṃ kṣiprataraṃ ca vyajyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1577: -- edition; Originally Brahma- and Tarka-kāṇḍas were together;
GSP33mbrahsiu:1578: Vacaspati does not know this division.]
GSP33mbrahsiu:1590: āmnāyavirodhādeva tu pratyakṣādīni pramāṇatāyāḥ kimiti na cyavante?
GSP33mbrahsiu:1610: karmavidhayo hi bhedāśrayā abhedāśrayāśca vedāntāḥ parasparaparāhatā asatyapi pramāṇāntaravirodhe durlabhaprāmāṇyāḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1623: tulyabalatve 'pi pratyakṣādīnāmāmnāyasya ca vastuni vikalpānupapattervirodhe saṃśayaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1637: śakyo hyāmnāyādevānādiravidyāsaṃskāro vibhramahetuḥ pratyakṣādiṣu saṃbhāvayituṃ niścetuṃ ca dehātmābhimāna iva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1642: yatra ca vyavahāraviparyayo na tatra prāmāṇyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1643: śabde tu saṃbhāvitadoṣe na tattvāvedanena prāmāṇyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1646: pratyakṣādīnāṃ tu vyavahāre saṃvādānna śakyate vyavahāravisaṃvādijñānaheturdoṣaḥ kalpayitum /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1649: tato doṣānubandhaḥ prāmāṇyaṃ ceti na virodhaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1655: tasmācchabdasya prāmāṇyābhyupagame pramāṇāntaravirodhe 'pi tasyaiva balavattvamiti sāṃpratam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1671: dṛṣṭaṃ ca hetutvenāpekṣitāyā api pūrvasyāḥ pratipatteḥ parasyāḥ pratipatterbalīyastvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1684: tatrābhedaḥ samākṣiptabheda eva pratāyata iti vyāghātaḥ ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1696: tatra virodha eva nāstīti balābalacintā nāvatarati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1709: laukikāstu śabdāḥ pramāṇāntarāpekṣaṃ svārthamabhidadhatīti yuktā teṣāṃ tadanusāriṇī vṛttiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1716: tatra dvitīyasyā api vṛtteḥ śabdānāṃ pravṛttidarśanāttayā pramāṇaviṣayalābhaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1717: yatra tu śabdāḥ svarasena labhante viṣayam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1727: pramāṇe tu svarasasiddhaṃ parityajya kalpanāyāṃ na nibandhanamasti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1744: svarasalabhye tvarthe pratītita eva prāmāṇyamiti netaretarāśrayatā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1748: na khalu rajatajñānānugrahāya śuktiśakalajñānasya gocaro 'paraḥ kalpyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1773: yatra tvekavākyatayā saṃbhūyakāritvaṃ tatrānupajātavirodhitayā svarasavṛttyā mukhye sthite,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1774_1: parapadāni dvitīyayā vṛttyā pūrvāpekṣitamarthaṃ samarpayantyekavākyatāsāmarthyāditi mukhyabalīyastvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1790: atha bhavati kasya cittīvrakrodhākrāntasvāntatayā samuddhatadhvāntatiraskṛtavivekavijñānasyānarthamapyarthatvena paśyataḥ śāstropadeśamatikrāmataḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1796: tathāpi teṣāmatatparatvān na tatra prāmāṇyaṃ vṛttānteṣvivārthavādapadānām /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1802: tadevaṃ balavattve 'pyāmnāyasya yo nāma mandadhīrlaukikavacasāṃ pratyakṣādivirodha upacaritārthatvadarśanāllokavadvede 'pi śabdavṛttamiti manyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1803: yo vā nirūḍhanibiḍatayā bhedadarśanāndhakārasya pratyakṣādīnāmeva balavattvaṃ manyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1806: na hi yo nāma mandaviṣeṇa vṛścikena daṣṭo mriyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1815: tatra vastvantaravyavacchede ubhayasmin vā bhedaḥ pratyakṣagocara iti bhavati virodhaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1816: svarūpavidhimātre tu kasyacidvyavacchedena śūnye na bhedaḥ pramāṇārthaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1831: na hi tatra kvaciddeśe kāle vā niṣedhaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1836: khapuṣpādiṣu tāvatsiddheṣu khādiṣu tadvidhāḥ puṣpādayo niṣidhyante,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1839: kutaścinnimittād buddhau labdharūpāṇāṃ bahirniṣedhaḥ kriyata iti varṇayanti,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1842: api cānapekṣitaviṣayaniṣedhye vyavacchede śūnyatā pramāṇārthaḥ syāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1845: yastu bhedāya vyavacchedaḥ sa bhedyayoḥ siddhimapekṣate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1846: na ca sā vidhānādṛta iti prāgvidhānameṣitavyam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1850: na saṃnihitajaṃ tacca tadanyāmarśi jāyate // MBs_1.6 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:1851: na khalvekapramāṇajñānavyāpārau santau vidhivyavacchedau kramavantau yujyete,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1853: kramavatorhi vyāpārayoḥ paścāttano na tadvyāpāraḥ syāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1862: anavabhāsamāne hi tatra vyavacchedye vyavacchedamātraṃ syāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1877: iti ca saṃnihitārthasāmānye niṣedho vidhipūrva eva,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1905: mā sma bhūdaviśeṣeṇa mā na bhūdekadhījuṣām // MBs_1.7 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:1921: na tvidānīṃ darśanapratiniyamasya sāmarthyam, tathā hi ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:1922: pratiniyatamapi tatra deśe kāle ca rūpe darśanaṃ tayoryathā rūpavidhimātropakṣayānna [KKS_47] rasaṃ vyavacchinatti,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1937: api ca ekaniyamādanyavyavacchede citrādiṣu nīlādīnāmekadarśanabhājāṃ bhedo na sidhyet,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1943: yatprakṛtiḥ khalu yaḥ padārthaḥ sa tayaiva prakṛtyā vidheyaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1950: arūpeṇa ca bhinnatvaṃ vastuno nāvakalpate // MBs_1.8 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:1953: tathā ca tasyā ekasyā anekavṛttervastusvabhāvatve vastūnāmapi bhedo na syāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1955: atha mā bhūdeṣa doṣa ityarthāntarameva vyāvṛttirāsthīyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:1956: tathāpi vyāvṛtterarūpatvātsvarūpeṇa na bhāvā vyāvṛttāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:1988: na hi kalpitena svabhāvena pāramārthikī tadvattā yujyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2005: na khalu svahetuprāpitodayeṣu svabhāvavyavasthiteṣu vastuṣu svabhāvasthitaye vastvantarāpekṣā yujyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2020: apekṣātaḥ, tathā hi pratiyogyapekṣaṃ tasya svarūpaṃ vyavasthitam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2021: tathā ca yathāyathaṃ bhedaiḥ pratiyogyapekṣairātmabhūtairbhinnāḥ sarve bhāvā iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2032: hetvantarācca pratiyoginaḥ saṃpadyamānaḥ paścādbhedo na svabhāvaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2036: nānapekṣaṃ kadācidittasya tadvidhatvāttena tadvidhenaiva saha jāyata iti na vikalarūpaprādurbhāvaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2048: tathā hi, nānapekṣya pratiyoginaṃ bhedaḥ pratīyata iti ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:2051: yathā vyavasthitānapekṣasvabhāvā rūpādayaścakṣurādyapekṣāyāṃ pratītau na sāpekṣasvabhāvāḥ kathyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2067: bhedo 'pyevaṃ kiṃ na lokasiddhaḥ? api ca
GSP33mbrahsiu:2077: apekṣāhetuśca tatra sādhāraṇī kriyā vidyate vyavasthitayorapi vastunoḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2091: arthakriyākṛte bhede rūpabhedo na labhyate // MBs_1.10 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2102: tau ca loke pratītibhedau satyapi saṃyogidravyavikriyāsāmānye /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2109: yathā cakṣuṣi satyapyadṛṣṭāyāśca badhire tatrāsaṃbhāvinyāḥ śabdabuddherindriyabhedaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2115: yasya khalvadvayaṃ jagattasya kāryajātamekatraiva dṛśyata iti kathamadarśanam?
GSP33mbrahsiu:2129: yastu kṣaṇikavādī tattvameva viśeṣasya na manyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2133: atha kāryābhede na (atha na kāryābhedena -- edition)
GSP33mbrahsiu:2138: yathā tarhi kāryasvabhāvābhedāya na kāraṇasvabhāvābhedo 'pekṣyate, tathā
GSP33mbrahsiu:2150: tatra yathā vyāvahārikādabhedātkāryābhedastathā vyāvahārikādbhedātkāryabheda iti na viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2195: na hi rathādayastatsaṃyogādayo vā nabho vyaśnuvate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2204: tathā ca payaso 'pi tailaṃ tilebhyaśca dadhi syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2213: na tayā tilānāṃ payasaśca bhedaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2220: na hyekaviṣaya ekasya śaktyaśaktī yujyete iti ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:2222: yathā khalu dīrghakālāḥ padārthā mitakālairdharmaiḥ saṃbadhyamānāstaddharmāṇo 'taddharmāṇaśca na virodhapadabhājaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2227: yo 'pi dīrghakālamarthaṃ na pratipadyate taṃ pratīdaṃ punaḥ paṭhitavyam ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:2229: eko 'pi vahniḥ kiñcideva dahati pacati ca /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2231: tathā na dāhāntarāṇi pākāntarāṇi vā karoti tasminneva dāhye pākye ca /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2232: tathā bījādayaḥ pratyekaṃ samarthā api nāṅkurāntarāṇi janayanti,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2236: anyaṃ pradhvastamāgāminaṃ vaikaṃ kiṃ na janayati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2242: abhede 'pi tarhi payasastilānāṃ dadhno 'nutpattau na virodhaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2244: yasya tāvaddadhnaḥ payaso janma na tasya tilebhyo 'nutpattiḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2249: na hi samarthamityeva kāraṇaṃ sarvaṃ tulyajātīyaṃ janayati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2272: tenaikatrāpi viruddhadharmāveśamabhyupayatā durlabha eva dadhno janakatvājanakatvābhyāṃ tilapayasorvibhāga iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2280: abhedādiva ca tādṛśāt kāryābhedasya bhedādapi tadvidhādbhedasyopapatteḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2297: tenāsmin parimitānāṃ viruddhābhimatānāmapyanante na samāveśo na yujyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2311: kalpite 'pi kāryabhedādyavasthāyā vā kāraṇabhede kimiti na kāryāntaram?
GSP33mbrahsiu:2319: na tu payasastailaṃ tilebhyo dadhi? yadi matam ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:2361: tatra yathā bhinnāsu śaktiṣu tadbhedādupakārān bhinnāneko 'rthasvabhāvaḥ karoti,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2401: sa ca na siddhatvenāsiddhatvena vā yujyata ityuktam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2404: bhedapratipattau sarvasya sarvato bhedagatiḥ syāt, aviśeṣāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2437: na caiṣa viśeṣaḥ prāgvastubhedasiddheḥ sidhyatīti tadevetaretarāśrayatvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2457: iti jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vā pramāṇāntaraṃ vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2461: api ca sanmātrarūpe sarvatra pratīyamāne tatsvabhāveṣu vastuṣu netarābhimata itarābhimatapramāṇānutpādaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2468: na cārthamātraṃ dṛṣṭavato 'rthāntare sa evāyamiti pratyabhijñāsti yathaikāṃ gāṃ dṛṣṭavato gavāntare /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2480: tatra yadyekamapi na gamyate nirviṣayataiva syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2481: apratyabhijñānaṃ ca yadi govailakṣaṇyāducyeta satyapi sanmātrarūpānugame,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2484: na hi yādṛśo devadattasya punardarśane ekatvapratyayastādṛśo gavāntare /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2495: grahaṇaṃ lakṣaṇākhyeyaṃ jñātrā śuddhaṃ tu gṛhyate //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2496: na ca yathā maṇikaṃ dṛṣṭavato maṇikāntare 'nusandhiḥ tathā śarāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra mṛjjātirapyapahnūyeta /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2498: na tu yathā maṇikāntare sāmānyarūpāṇāṃ bhūyastvādutkaṭaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2521: nanūktena prakāreṇa pramāṇādanyato 'pi bhedajñānasyodayo na saṃbhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2560: na ca vastubhedaviṣayatve sāmānādhikaraṇyamavakalpate satyapi saṃbandhe /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2561: saṃbandhidvayaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatvena dvābhyāmekayā vā buddhyā gṛhyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2576: atastayā viruddhaḥ prakhyābhedo na vastubhedavyavasthāyai prabhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2596: dṛṣṭaḥ saṃsargadharmo 'yaṃ yadyekamapi vai tathā // MBs_1.17 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2603: rūpasaṃskārābhāve hi na sa cākṣuṣaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2608: atha nārūpaḥ pratīyata iti nāyaṃ prasaṅgaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2611: tathā nagaratrailokyādibuddhayo vividhaviṣayākārā nirbhāsante bhedābhāve 'pīti viṣayākārajñānavādino manyante /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2618: na ca saṃbandhisaṃbandhaḥ saṃsargo vyavadhānataḥ // MBs_1.18 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2630: ityādibuddhayo vyavahārāṅgabhūtā dravyeṣu guṇajātyupādhinibandhanāḥ tasyaitā na yathāvastu,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2634: evaṃ ca pratyayaviracitenaivāyamarthena vyāvṛtto vyavahāro 'nuvṛttaśceti vyarthā vastubhedakalpanā,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2636: yathārthatvāya hi vyāvahārikīṇāṃ buddhīnāṃ vastubhedaḥ kalpyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2648: tatrāsati vastubheda ādhyātmiko doṣo 'vidyālakṣaṇo vyāvahārikajñānabījamiti nārtho vastubhedena /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2663: yattu yathā pramāṇenāvagamyate tasya tathābhāve viruddhatvābhidhāne kaṃ batāyamāśritya hetuṃ viruddhatvāviruddhatve vyavasthāpayet?
GSP33mbrahsiu:2667: yato nedṛśāṃ vipratiṣiddhārthajñānānāṃ prāmāṇyameva yujyate saṃśayajñānavat /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2680: tatra yathā saṃśayajñānaṃ vipratiṣedhādapramāṇaṃ tathā sāmānyaviśeṣapratipattirapi,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2685: yatra tarhi na nirṇayastatra vikalpātmatā syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2687: evaṃ virodhe 'pi dvayorekasya vā jñānasya viruddharūpopagrahe tadrūpādhigatyoranyonyanirākaraṇāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2689: parasparanirākṛtau tulyabalatve sandeha iti na saṃśayajñānādekasya sāmānyaviśeṣapratipattirviśiṣyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2707: yathā na sāmānyāṃśo dvirūpo viśeṣāṃśo vā rūpavirodhābhāvāt ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:2718: yena sāmānyaviśeṣayoḥ svarūpavirodhābhāvāddvitvaṃ na syādanyatarasyeva bhāgasya /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2720: sāmānyaviśeṣayośca parasparātmatvena pratipatterasatyapyanyonyābhāvalakṣaṇe svarūpavirodhe buddhe rūpabhedāddvitvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2725: na cetkutastyamekatvamasti ced dvyātmatā katham // MBs_1.22 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2769: ekatve tu yathā sāmānyaviśeṣavibhāgayoḥ svabuddhisamadhigatayorna vilakṣaṇaṃ buddhyantaramarthyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2770: tathā sāmānyabuddherna buddhyantaraṃ vilakṣaṇaṃ viśeṣādhigamāya prārthyeta /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2797: sāmānyaṃ na hi vastvātmā na bhedaścitra eva saḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2799: yasyaikamubhayātmakaṃ vastu na tasya sāmānyamātraṃ vastuna ātmā na viśeṣamātram /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2803: yasya tvanugamaḥ sa vasturūpaṃ na bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2804: tathā ca śabdāntaramavalambya bhedā eva satyā ityetatpratipādyate śabdāntareṇa vā hetunā dvyātmakamekamiti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2807: mā bhūdvastu tadaṃśatvaṃ tu na vāryate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2840: tadevaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ tadbhāvānyabhāvābhyāmabheda ityadvaitaṃ jagadityuktamanyaprakārayā vācā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2849: gavāśvasya tu pratyekaṃ gavāśvatve bhedābhāvādanibandhanameva tat /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2869: tatra pūrvasyāṃ kalpanāyāṃ na vastuno 'nugama ityananvitāni vastūni /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2871: sarvathā yena viśeṣeṇāyamaśvādgovastu vyavasthāpayatyanyat tadviśeṣayujastu tasyānanvayādbhedavādaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2872: athānanvayadoṣānna viśeṣamāśrayati abhedavāda iti na dvaitādvaitakalpanopapadyata iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2874: teṣāmapi dravyanayaḥ paryāyanaya eva vā // MBs_1.26 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2888: vardhamānakabhaṅgena rucakakriyāyāṃ na kiñcidutpannaṃ naṣṭaṃ veti prītiśokau tadarthinorna syātām /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2891: paryāyamātre hi hemni hemno vināśātparyāyavināśe kathaṃ madhyasthatā?
GSP33mbrahsiu:2900: paryāyāntare ca paryāyāntarasyānanugamādananvitāni tarhi vyāvṛttasvabhāvāni vastūni /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2918: tasya utpattisthitibhaṅgānāmekatra samavāye dravyārthino madhyasthatā bhavet,
GSP33mbrahsiu:2943: apravṛttinivṛttīdaṃ prāptaṃ sarvatra hī jagat // MBs_1.28 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2944: yadā hi sarvaprakāreṣvanaikāntikatvaṃ bhāvānām, tathā sati ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:2962: yadi khalu prītyādīnāṃ sadasattve [KKS_70] naikāntike ('naikāntike -- edition) ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:2981: naikajñānaṃ samīkṣyaikaṃ na bhedaṃ tattvahānataḥ // MBs_1.29 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:2983: kutaḥ? āpekṣiko hi bhedo nānyamanapekṣya śakyate grahītum /
GSP33mbrahsiu:2988: na tvevam (Ms A; na caivam -- edition)
GSP33mbrahsiu:2993: tatrābhedaṃ gṛhītvā tamupādāya tasya yathāvanniścayāśaktau vyavacchedakalpanopapadyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3018: na copalakṣyate pratyakṣabuddhau viśeṣaḥ prakāśate ceti vipratiṣiddham /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3020: yastu saṃvittāveva vipratipadyate sarvānātmavyāvṛttaspaṣṭapratibhāsaṃ pratyakṣamiti vadan,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3027: vastudvayānupapatterekasya ca dvyātmatāyogādavaśyakalpanīye 'nyatarasya mithyātve yuktaṃ viśeṣāvabhāsasya mithyātvam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3036: mānasya eva buddhayaḥ kḷptayogyabhāvā mithyātvaṃ prati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3049: tatropādhau pratīyantāṃ tathā bhinnā na rūpataḥ // MBs_1.32 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3057: yo bhāvānāṃ tattvaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ vā syāt arthasiddhirevaiṣā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3060: api ca bhedatvādeva viśvasya bhedo 'bhedopādāna iti śakyate 'numātum /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3078: bhedo yathā taraṅgāṇāṃ bhedādbhedaḥ kalāvataḥ // MBs_1.34 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3092: na hi pratyekaṃ taruṣu vanamiti buddhiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3106: vyāvṛttasvabhāvasya tadagrahe grahaṇameva hi na syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3124: tasmātprakṛtyaiva kecitkasyacidabhedāvamarśasya yogyāḥ kecinneti svabhāvaviparītā bhāvānāṃ sāmarthyātiśayā kalpayitavyāḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3126: ekasyaivāstu māhātmyaṃ yadeko 'pi nānevāvabhāsate (nāneva bhāsate -- edition)
GSP33mbrahsiu:3144: [KKS_74] evaṃ pratyakṣādivirodhātkarmavidhivirodhācca śrutārthaparigrahe ye manyante vedāntānāmupacaritārthatvaṃ tatpratibodhanāya vihitaḥ prayatnaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3155: tathā ca kathaṃ tarhi mantrārthavādāḥ sopaniṣatkā ityāśaṅkya ‘
GSP33mbrahsiu:3176: na khalu sopakaraṇe samagre pramāṇe satīcchāpi puruṣasyāpekṣyate jñānaṃ prati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3194: apravṛtto 'pi hi svādhyāyādhyayanavidhivākyādhyayane puruṣāntarādhītāttatastasya cānyeṣāṃ ca vākyānāmadhyayane pravartate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3225: anyonyasaṃśrayānnaiṣa śābdo bodhaḥ sa no paraḥ // MBs_2.3 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3226: śabdādavagamya vidheyaṃ yā pravṛttiḥ sā vidheḥ prayojanam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3237: jāte bodhe na pravartyo natarāṃ khalvabodhake /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3261: artho jñātavya ityukte jñeyaḥ syānnāvivakṣitaḥ // MBs_2.5 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3290: evaṃ ca tasyāvivakṣitārthatve itare 'pi tathā syuḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3296: tacchabdato labdhajanmano 'pyātmatattvāvabodhasya puruṣārthasādhanatvāvagamo vidherityetadapi na śobhanam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3298: iṣyate mokṣa iti cetsādhyastattvacyuterna saḥ // MBs_2.9 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3312: satyam, bhāvarūpaṃ tu mokṣaṃ niratiśayānandalakṣaṇaṃ niratiśayaiśvaryalakṣaṇaṃ cābhipretyaitaducyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3317: tathāpi nāsau tattvajñānātpṛthagiti na tena sādhyā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3330_0: yadā tu viditātmatattvasyādvayaṃ viśuddhaprakāśamātmānaṃ paśyataḥ samutkhātāyāmanavayavenāvidyāyāṃ
GSP33mbrahsiu:3348: anuvādaśca pramāṇāntaraviṣaya iti tadapekṣo bhūtārtho nārtha ucyata iti sāpekṣatvādaprāmāṇyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3352: evaṃ ca sati tattvapratipattipare vākye yadyapi vākyārthabodhātparācīnā pravṛttiḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3357: uta bhūtārthatā tatra siddhārthamapi yadvacaḥ // MBs_2.13 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3365: yattu bhūtārthamapi na mānāntarādhigata iti bodhayati na tadanuvādakam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3369: sāpekṣatāyāḥ ko hetuḥ śuddhā siddhārthatā yadi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3378: evaṃ ca puruṣabuddhiprabhavaṃ bhūtārthamabhūtārthaṃ vā vaco bhavati sāpekṣam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3392: asaṃbhavati tu kārye 'rthe na kutaścidvisaṃvādāśaṅketi nāpekṣyamasti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3395: viśeṣo na hi gamyeta sāpekṣatve tadā tayoḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3399: yadi śabdaḥ pramāṇāntarādhigataviṣayo loke dṛṣṭa iti,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3400: pramāṇāntarasyāviṣaye tarhi natarāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ tasya bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3419: pramāṇe hi śabde tadviṣaye saṃbhavati tadapi sāpekṣaṃ syāttatsaṃbhava iva śabdaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3440: api ca pratyakṣādhigataviṣayaṃ kiñcidanumānamiti na sāmānyatodṛṣṭasya tathā pratyakṣasāpekṣatā,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3441: yathā cāgamapūrvakaṃ ṣaḍjādivivekaviṣayaṃ pratyakṣamiti na sarvaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tathā,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3442: evaṃ puruṣavacasāṃ pramāṇāntarādhigataviṣayatvadarśane 'pi nāpauruṣeyasya tathābhāvo bhūtārthasyāpi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3455: vede tu sādhyasādhanabhāvo 'pi na puruṣavivakṣāpūrvakaḥ ityanapekṣatvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3471: loke vede na vyapekṣā talloke ca vyapekṣaṇam // MBs_2.22 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3486: tatra vede 'pi viniyoga eva pramāṇārthaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3506: yadi puruṣo 'dhigate viṣaye vacaḥ prayuṅkte iti viniyogaviṣayatā tasya kalpyate pramāṇāntarāpekṣatvāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3511: vacaḥ prayuṅkte puruṣo nākasmāttena tadgiri // MBs_2.26 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3522: yatra tūpalabdherasaṃbhava eva yathā dṛṣṭārthe buddhādivākye,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3529: [KKS_84] ata eva pauruṣeyatvāpauruṣeyatve sāpekṣatvānapekṣatvakāraṇe nyāyavidbhirdaśite pauruṣeyatvanirākaraṇaprayatnena ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:3531: autpattike śabdārthasambandhe 'svātantryācchabdasya na puruṣabuddhipūrvakatvamiti na pramāṇāntarasaṃbhinnā śabdādarthāvagatiriti nirapekṣatvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3538: atha pramāṇāntarasaṃbhave 'pi yadi codanāprāmāṇyaṃ na vyāhanyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3541: pramāṇāntarasaṃbhave hi sarvajñābhimatabuddhādyupadiṣṭo 'pi dharmaḥ pratīyeta tatra na dharmatattvamavadhāritaṃ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3567: atha saṃsargabhājo no padārthāḥ kriyayā vinā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3568: kimāyātaṃ vidheḥ sāpi tvastyādiḥ sulabhā kva na // MBs_2.29 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3596: tathā cāstyarthaniṣṭhaṃ vākyaṃ pramāṇāntarāpekṣamevārthaṃ bodhayati pramāṇaviṣayatāyā astyarthatvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3601: bhidyetottarakāle vā bhavantī na khalu tridhā // MBs_2.31 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3611: tatra yadi buddhiḥ pramāṇaviṣayatāṃ gocarayati pramite hi syāt na pramāṇādeva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3612: na hi prāk pramāṇotpatteḥ san pramāṇasaṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3618: tathāpi naiva bhidyeta netthaṃ cānyavyapekṣatā // MBs_2.32 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3628: syālliṅgamapi sāpekṣaṃ tatsiddhestata eva cet // MBs_2.33 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3669: meyatvameva sattā cenmāne trividhatā kutaḥ // MBs_2.35 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3697: pramite ca na jijñāsā punaḥ syātsadasattvayoḥ // MBs_2.38 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3698: anāśritakālaviśeṣe pramāṇayogamātre sattve pramitanaṣṭamapi vastu saditi tenārthakriyāprasaṅge 'naṣṭeneva,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3701: sa eva tarhi viśeṣaḥ sadasadvyavahāravyavasthāyā hetuḥ kāryavyavasthāyā iva,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3706: kiṃ ca pramite 'rthe sadasattve jijñāseranna punarlaukikāḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3716: sā ca naṣṭāccyuteti na tasya sattvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3717: smaryamāṇe tu kutaściccyutā kutaścinneti na sarvasyāsattvamiti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3728: tathā ca so 'stiśabdenābhidhīyata ityarthasvabhāvaniṣṭham [KKS_89] astyarthapradhānaṃ vākyamiti kutaḥ sāpekṣatvam?
GSP33mbrahsiu:3731: bhinnā evārthasvabhāvāḥ pramāṇaṃ prati yogyāḥ sacchabdavācyāḥ santu,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3747: yo hi sattāmavajānīte sa dravyatvādīnyapyavajānīta eva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3748: na kila tejo dṛṣṭavato 'psu tadavamarśo bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3749: api ca sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyā api santa eva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3774: athaitāvān pramāṇayogyo 'rthakriyāsāmarthyo veti pramāṇayogyatve 'rthakriyāsāmarthye vā saṃgrahaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3785: yastu dravyaṃ guṇaḥ karma rūpaṃ vijñānamiti vā saṃśayaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3806: na ca niścite viśeṣaṇābhāve viśiṣṭābhidhānānuviddhaḥ saṃśayo bhavati daṇḍābhāvaniścaya iva ‘
GSP33mbrahsiu:3839: kāryapramāṇasadasadbhāvanibandhane hi sadasadvyavahāravibhāge tasyāpravṛttireva kāryapramāṇasadasadvyavahāravibhāgasyāpi tannibandhatvaprasaṅgāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3841: tasmādarthasvabhāva ekā satteti (@svabhāva ekaḥ satteti -- edition)
GSP33mbrahsiu:3850: bhūmau nikhātamavidyamānendriyasaṃbandhamadṛśyamānāvinābhūtamasaṃvedyamānānyathānavakalpamānaṃ vastu pralīnadraṣṭṛkaṃ yattasya na pratyakṣānumānārthāpattyāgamahetavaḥ santi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3857: tatra pramāṇahetubhāvalakṣaṇayogyatārūpe sattve pramāṇahetvabhāvasya niścayātsaṃśayo na syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3858: atha svabhāvaviśeṣaḥ kaścitpramāṇaṃ prati yogyaḥ sattvam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3860: atha vā pramāṇaviśiṣṭaḥ sacchabdārtha ityetadanena nirākriyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3861: na niścite viśeṣaṇābhāve viśiṣṭābhidhāyiśabdānuviddhaḥ saṃśayo yukta iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3865: amitaṃ hi tathā kasmāttathā na punaranyathā // MBs_2.41 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3871: aparicchinnaṃ hi tathā pramāṇena kimiti tadvidham,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3873: na cettasya tathābhāve 'tathābhāve vā pramāṇavyāpāraḥ kiṃnimitta ekapakṣānurāgaḥ?
GSP33mbrahsiu:3879: iti kīṭakaṇṭakādyabhāve 'pramite kathaṃ tannyāsaḥ? tathā hi ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:3911: atha yatra pravṛttiḥ syāttatra kevalasaṃvidaḥ // MBs_2.44 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3912: jijñāseta na sūkṣmārthaṃ kaivalyaṃ saṃvido yadi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3913: kevalo viṣayo neṣṭo rūponmiśre 'pi tadyataḥ // MBs_2.45 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3922: pramite 'pi bhūbhāgādau sthūle sūkṣmakīṭakaṇṭakādibhāvābhāvaparīkṣā na syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3935: mānābhāvaṃ yadi kṣuṇṇaṃ meyābhāvasya tatra kim /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3968: yadi khalvadarśane viparyayadarśanabhramo bhavati suṣuptādyavasthāsu viśvābhāvadarśanabhramaḥ syādālokādarśanabhramavat /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3971: āropasya viṣayaṃ purovarti vastu āropaṇīyaṃ ca rajataṃ jñānenānāpnuvan na rajatabhramavān bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:3975: na ca buddhyabhāvo jñānasya viṣayo na vyavahārābhāvaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:3980: [KKS_95] astu vā mānayogyatvaṃ sattvaṃ tacca pramīyatām // MBs_2.51 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:3995: yadā vacaḥ pramāṇayogyatāyāṃ paryavasitaṃ na viśiṣṭārthasattvaṃ bodhayati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4004: pramāṇāntarabhinnārthamapi mānaṃ na no vacaḥ // MBs_2.53 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4009: na khalu pramāṇāntarasaṃbhinnārthamapi vaco na pramāṇam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4011: kathaṃ punaḥ pramāṇaṃ sāpekṣamiti cet, ucyate ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:4016: evamayaṃ puruṣo veda'iti ca pratīteḥ puruṣajñānāpekṣam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4018: kathaṃ tarhi puruṣavacaḥ kiñcidabādhitārthamapi sāpekṣatvenāpramāṇaṃ kathyate? ucyate ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:4020: yadapekṣaṃ tvasyārthe prāmāṇyaṃ yatsiddhimukhena taṃ sādhayati tatra pramāṇāṃśe bādhyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4030: āptavacaḥ punarnārthe nāpi pramāṇāṃśe saṃbhavatpramāṇagocaraṃ bādhyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4031: pramāṇāṃśe cānapekṣaṃ tanmukhena cārthasiddhiṃ vidadhannāpramāṇaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4037: evaṃ ca pramāṇāntarasaṃbhinnārthatve 'pi vedāntavacasāṃ na prāmāṇyavyāhatiḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4049: [KKS_97] na hi pūrvāvamarśena vinā sāmānyakalpanā // MBs_2.59 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4051: avamarśo dṛṣṭasatastathā na hi sadantare // MBs_2.60 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4061: ko nu pūrvāvamarśo 'yaṃ pūrvarūpānvayo dhiyaḥ // MBs_2.61 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4063: sarvātmanā tvanugamo na dṛṣṭaḥ khaṇḍamuṇḍayoḥ // MBs_2.62 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4067: na dṛṣṭamallakasyāsti maṇike khalu tādṛśaḥ // MBs_2.64 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4084: na hi devadattasya dvitīyadarśane yādṛśo rūpānugamaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4091: pūrvāvamarśaḥ sa iti prakhyetyapi na śobhate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4092: maṇikaṃ vīkṣitavataḥ so 'pi nodeti mallake // MBs_2.65 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4094: so 'yam'ityabhedamavagamayantī bhinneṣvapi sāmānyakalpanāheturbuddhiḥ pūrvāvamarśa ityucyata ityetadapi na śobhate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4101: api ca dṛṣṭamaṇikasya mallake na bhavati drāgiva ‘
GSP33mbrahsiu:4139: ‘rājño 'yaṃ puruṣaḥ'phalitā ete vanaspatayaḥ'iti kriyārahiteṣvapi saṃsargaḥ pratīyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4142: yato na nirjñātarājasaṃbandhasya puruṣasya phalavatāṃ ca vanaspatīnāṃ satteha pratipādyā gamyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4150: so 'sti'; ‘ye ca phalitāḥ te santi'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4155: athāpi na kriyārahitaṃ vākyamasti kriyāyāṃ ca sāpekṣatā,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4164: tathā ca śrutayaḥ kāścidevameva brahma pratipādayanti ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:4167: yathāgneḥ kṣudrā viṣphuliṅgā vyuccaranti evamevāsmādātmanaḥ sarve devāḥ'; ityādi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4206: anadhigataṃ hi śroturarthaṃ bodhayituṃ vacaḥ prayujyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4216: tasmādvivakṣāviśeṣasiddhirnāsaṃsṛṣṭeṣu padārtheṣu bhavatīti tathā vivakṣayā prayuktāḥ saṃsṛjyante /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4239: atha pramāṇāntareṇopalabhyārthaṃ vivakṣitvā parasmai pratipādayati puruṣaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4252: apūrvo 'pi hi śrotuḥ saṃsargo vaktuḥ pramāṇānumānamukhena satyatāṃ labhate tadasaṃbhave 'satyatvādbuddhādivākyeṣu /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4259: kathaṃ nu vidhyadhīnatvaṃ yadi syādanyathā vṛthā // MBs_2.73 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4263: vidhirnaivaṃ kasya hetoratha syādaparaṃ padam // MBs_2.75 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4269: na tāvadvidhiḥ sākṣātsaṃsargasāmānyaṃ tadviśeṣaṃ vā bodhayati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4274: na ca loke padaiḥ svārthāḥ svarūpamātraniṣṭhatayaiva pratyyante /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4304: [KKS_104] śabdādeva mite yo 'pi manyate saṃgatigraham // MBs_2.78 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4305: nānyonyasaṃśrayāvadyaṃ na svayaṃ pramite hi saḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4306: pareṇa śabdāvagate tatpravṛttyā ca sūcite // MBs_2.79 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4335: na khalu bījāṅkurayorivānayorekasya prāthamyaṃ vyavasthāpayituṃ śakyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4338: api ca sarvapratipattṝṇāmanumānapūrvā śabdātpratipattiriti teṣāṃ śabdo 'nuvādaka eva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4352: tatra laukikīṣu pravṛttiṣu laukike viditasaṃbandhe vede 'pi tatpratipattireva syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4355: tatra vede laukikānāṃ viśeṣaṇānāmasaṃbhavādalaukikaṃ viśeṣāntaraṃ pratīyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4356: evamapi yaḥ śabdārtho vede sāmānyaṃ sa lokasiddha iti nānuvādatā vyāvartate padārthāntaravat /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4357: yo 'pi viśeṣaḥ so 'nyāsaṃbhavena pariśeṣānumānagocara iti na pramāṇāntarāviṣayatvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4361: tatra vaidikīṣu pravṛttiṣu laukikapravṛttihetvabhāvādalaukike [KKS_106] tu pravṛttihetau vaidikānāṃ vidhāyakānāṃ saṃbandhajñānam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4366: na ca laukikasyaiva śreyaḥsādhanatvasya saṃbhava iti yuktam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4368: tatra prayogadarśanālliṅādestadanusāreṇa ca śabdārthāvadhāraṇāt pramāṇāntaragamyatāpi śabdārthānupraveśinī /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4373: alaukike pravṛttihetau śabdasya sāmarthyajñānakāle pramito vā syāt, na vā?
GSP33mbrahsiu:4378: na hyapramitayoḥ saṃbandhinostadāśrayaḥ saṃbandhaḥ pramātuṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4416: tathā na viparyāsaḥ kathaṃ hi tatra yathārthatve tathābhūtagrāhiṇī tatpratītirarthaśūnyā syāt?
GSP33mbrahsiu:4418: parajñānena ca paraḥ pratipadyata iti subhāṣitam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4443: tattanmithyātve tadasaṃbhave vā pramāṇapratītibādhane 'rthapratīterapi bādhanāttadabādhe cābādhāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4445: anyathā pramāṇāntaraparatantraṃ puruṣavaco 'rthe sāpekṣamityetadeva na syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4446: na hi yo yasyāviṣayaḥ sa tatra sāpekṣo 'napekṣo vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4466: yadi ca śābdapratītivyatirekiṇyāpi pratītyā sa viṣayīkriyate 'pramāṇātmikayāpi,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4467: bhavatyayamaśābdasyāpi jñānasya gocara iti pramāṇāntarāśaṅkā kena vāryate?
GSP33mbrahsiu:4470: sati hyanyasmin prayojake 'rthe yasyābhāve na prayogaḥ so 'pi tasya śabdasya prayojaka iti gamyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4471: yathā satsu hetvantareṣu yasyābhāve na kāryaṃ so 'pi heturgamyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4476: na tu śreyohetutve sati pramāṇāntaragamyatāyā abhāvāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4479: tatra śreyaḥsādhanatāyāḥ prayojakatvasyāvadhāritatvāt [KKS_109] tadabhāve tannibandhana iti gamyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4484: tatsadbhāvācca prayoga upapadyata iti na teṣu sāmarthyakalpanā,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4488: na hi ya ekatra yasya pramāṇasya gocaraḥ so 'nyatrāpi mithyā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4491: tathā yāgādiṣu viprakṛṣṭakālaphaleṣu vedāvagamyaṃ śreyaḥsādhanatvaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4496: tadaviṣaye tu śabdārthe na tadvirodha iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4510: api ca viśiṣṭasiddhau viśeṣaṇamapi śreyohetutvamātraṃ siddham /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4521: tadāpi pravṛttipramitastadhetupratyayo na tamantareṇetyāptavacanārthavadanumeyatā na vyāvartate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4533: na brūmo vidhiranyathā vṛthā syāditi tadadhīnaḥ saṃsargaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4534: kiṃ tu pramāṇāntmanaiva sa svaśabdena pratipādyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4552: kva ca pramāṇameṣo 'rthe na yāgādau svaśabdake // MBs_2.87 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4556: na saṃsargaḥ padārthānāṃ svaśabdaistu prakāśitāḥ // MBs_2.89 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4559: ato na viddhyabhāvena saṃsargo na prakalpate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4565: avidhiṣvapi laukikeṣu vākyeṣu śroturanadhigato 'pūrvaḥ saṃsargaḥ pratīyate ‘
GSP33mbrahsiu:4569: anupāyatve hi tasya na sa kāminyā kṛtaḥ syāditi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4576: atha vā śabdastatra na duṣyati phalasādhanasāmarthye,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4580: tasmāt saṃbandhajñānāpekṣatvena padārthāntaraiḥ samānatvādvidhāyakārthasya na śakyaṃ viśeṣeṇa vaktuṃ ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:4582: sarva eva tu padārthāḥ saṃbandhayogyaiḥ kārakādibhāvaiḥ svapadebhyaḥ pratītāḥ sannikarṣeṇa saṃsṛjyante,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4584: loke ca [KKS_112] padaiḥ svārthānāṃ pratipādanaṃ sannikarṣeṇa viśiṣṭārthaparatayā,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4587: sarve hi te padairaparyavasitarūpāḥ svarūpamātre prakāśyante /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4588: evaṃ padārthāntaraistulyatvādvidheḥ na viśeṣeṇa tannibandhanaḥ saṃsargaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4589: sarvapadārthanibandhane ca saṃsarge na vidhyabhāvena saṃsargo nopapadyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4593: pravartakavacanāntarapravṛttidarśanena hi taddhetupratyayamanumāya tatra tasya sāmarthyaṃ gamyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4604: agnisattāmātrapratyayena vākyātpravṛttisiddherna vākyasya niyojane 'pi sāmarthyaṃ śakyate kalpayitum /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4605: arthāntarānvaye ca prayogapratyayopapattau na viśeṣānvaye pramāṇam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4609: pratipattividhau tulyaṃ yadi saiva prayojanam // MBs_2.92 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4612: hanta tarhi svarupe tanna vacaḥ paryavasati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4682: na hi vrīhyādisvarūpagrāhi pramāṇaṃ prayogaikadeśatāṃ bhajate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4694: svātmasthitiḥ supraśāntā phalaṃ tanna vidheḥ padam // MBs_2.103 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4707: tajjñānasya ca vividhārthamātrasaṃbhedāvabhāsasyātmatattvaṃ niṣprapañcaṃ dvaitaleśenāpyanavamṛṣṭaṃ kathaṃ gocaraḥ syāditi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4709: yato yo 'sāvadvayo dvaitaleśasaṃsparśavikala ātmatattvabodhaḥ so 'vacchedavibhrāntivirahāttasya svarūpāvasthānam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4721: tathā ca tatsvarūpasthitirviśvāśivopaśamānniratiśayāhlādāvāpteśca suṣṭhu praśāntāparaḥ puruṣārthaḥ phalam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4724: na ca puruṣārthe 'pyajñātopāye na pravartata iti yuktam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4728: tathā ‘yo hi yadicchati sa tatkaroti'; ityuktam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4731: tāvatā ca tatrāpi pravṛttisiddherna vidhāyakasya tatra vyāpāra āśrayitavyaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4753: ataḥ sā śabdapramāṇikā satī vidhiriti gīyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4771: na hi pratītimātreṇa ghaṭādayaḥ pravṛttihetava ityādi varṇitaṃ vidhiviveke /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4779: niyukto 'smi'iti yato buddhiḥ sa niyogo vidhiśabdaparyāya iti,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4795: na hi taṃ parityajya laukikamalaukikakalpane pramāṇamasti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4813: sa hi niyoktṛdharmaḥ svatantro vā syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4826: iti niyoge anyena dugdhāyāṃ na punardohamārabhate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4839: sa yadi pitṛlokakāmo bhavati saṃkalpādevāsya pitaraḥ samuttiṣṭhanti'; ityādi /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4849: na ca mokṣaḥ phalaṃ tasya sādhyo mokṣo na cāparaḥ // MBs_2.105 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4851: vidyaiva cādvayā śāntā tadastamaya ucyate // MBs_2.106 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:4859: 'śataṃ caikā ca hṛdayasya nāḍyastāsāṃ mūrdhānamabhi nissṛtaikā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4864: yathā vā madhuni nānākusumarasānāṃ samudre ca nadīnāṃ prāptiravibhāgalakṣaṇā tathā syāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4871: ‘tathā vidvān puṇyapāpe vidhūya nirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyamupaiti'iti śruteḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4873: ‘sa yo ha vai tatparamaṃ brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati';
GSP33mbrahsiu:4908: atha vijñānātmanāṃ śokamohādyabhāvo viśiṣyata iti cettatrāpi śokādayaścedātmāno vijñānātmanām,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4917: brahmaṇo nyūnaṃ samaṃ vā vijñānātmanām [KKS_121] aiśvaryaṃ syāt?
GSP33mbrahsiu:4961: na hi śuktikājñānotpādādanyā rajatajñānanivṛttistatsādhyā prayatnāntarasādhyā vā,
GSP33mbrahsiu:4969: tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śoka ekatvamanupaśyataḥ';
GSP33mbrahsiu:4976: na, ekasyāpi vastuno bhāvābhāvarūpeṇa vyapadeśāt, tathā ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:4977: ‘yadā ghaṭo naśyati tadā kapālāni jāyante'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4986: na hi tadagamane tadupādhestasya brahmaṇo bhedena vijñānātmatvam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4991_0: ‘araśca ha vai ṇyaścārṇavau brahmaloke tṛtīyasyāmito [KKS_123] divi tadairaṃmadīyaṃ
GSP33mbrahsiu:4991_1: sarastadaśvatthaḥ somasavanastadaparājitā pūrbrahmaṇaḥ prabhuvimitaṃ hiraṇmayaṃ veśma'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:4993: ‘ye cāmī araṇye śraddhāṃ satyaṃ tapa ityupāsate'; iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5010: tasmin parāmṛtāḥ parabrahmarūpeṇāmṛtāḥ santaḥ saṃnyāsayogādbhedena parameśvare svakṛtānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalānāṃ ca saṃnyāsādyogācca sarvamidaṃ kartrādi brahma ityupāsanāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5015: yathā candraloke yāvatsaṃpātamuṣitvā sthita eva tasmin bhuktabhogā āvartante naivaṃ sthita eva brahmaloke tata āvṛttiḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5017: tatpralaye hi na tata āvṛtto bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5032: ato 'vikṛtasya niyatadeśasya brahmaṇaḥ prāptaye yujyate mārgaviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5045: kasminnu bhagavo vijñāte sarvamidaṃ vijñātaṃ bhavati?
GSP33mbrahsiu:5054: viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ'ityādīni vacāṃsi [KKS_125] vākyabhedadoṣātpṛthagvidhitvamalabhamānāni tādarthyāttadānukūlyena stutyarthatayā vyavatiṣṭhante,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5061: ekatvapratipattestu dṛṣṭaṃ śrutaṃ ca phalaṃ śokādinivṛttaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5063: tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śoka ekatvamanupaśyataḥ';
GSP33mbrahsiu:5072: nanvevaṃ mukhya eva kāryakāraṇabhāva uktaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5079: ‘ekamevādvitīyam'iti punaḥ punaḥ śruteḥ sarvabhedanirāsaparatvānna śakyaṃ vaktum ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:5093: na hi bimbāt [KKS_126] parasparato vā vyāvṛttāni kānicidvastūni pratibimbāni /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5095: tathā na varṇebhyaḥ padavākyaprakaraṇādīni kānicidvastūni santi,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5100: ‘na tatra rathā na rathayogā na panthāno bhavanti,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5133: tathā ca yatkiñcidīśvaratvaṃ yacca vijñānaṃ yaścānando brahmādiṣu sthāvarānteṣu bhūteṣu brahmaṇi tāni /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5137: nanu prapañcaśūnyasyādvaitasya brahmarūpasya jñeyābhāvādīśitavyābhāvācca vijñānamaiśvaryaṃ cānupapannam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5145: kiṃ tu siddhena jñānarūpeṇa siddhayā ceśanaśaktyā jñeyamavāpnoti,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5146: īśitavyaṃ ca viniyuṅkte praśāsti ca prakāśadāhavat /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5147: siddhena hi prakāśarūpeṇa prakāśyaṃ prakāśayati vivasvān /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5161: evaṃ ‘sa tatra paryeti jakṣan krīḍan ramamāṇaḥ strībhirvā';
GSP33mbrahsiu:5168: ato yatra yatra nātyantamavacchedaḥ samutkarṣātteṣāṃ tāni tāni pratyāsatterbhūtānyātmatvena bhagavānuktvā ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:5190: na ca vidyayā anya iti puṣkalam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5195: śrūyate ca tasya phalaṃ bandhahetūnāṃ karmaṇāṃ kṣayaḥ ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:5197: tathā ‘tadyatheṣīkātūlamagnau protaṃ pradūyeta evaṃ hāsya sarve pāpmānaḥ pradūyante';
GSP33mbrahsiu:5201: anyatra ca ‘naitaṃ setumahorātre tarato na jarā na mṛtyurna śoko na sukṛtaṃ na duṣkṛtam';
GSP33mbrahsiu:5221: avidyādhyastāni hi karmāṇi tatsamucchede vidyayā samucchinnānyeva bhavanti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5227: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭe parāvare'; //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5232: yasya tu vidyā tatkṣayasādhanaṃ śāstrādgamyate tasya [KKS_130] tadanusāreṇa keṣāñcitkṣayo vidyayā,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5261: nanu pūrvasmin pakṣe tattvajñānānantaratvāddehapātasya sthitaprajñalakṣaṇābhidhānaṃ na yujyate ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:5266: kiṃ tu sādhaka evāvasthāviśeṣaṃ prāptaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5269: kiṃ tu ārabdhakāryakarmakṣayaṃ [KKS_131] bhogena pratīkṣata iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5272: yathā rajjvāṃ sarpasamāropasamutthabhayajanmāno vepathuprabhṛtayastattvadarśanādapāvṛte bhaye kasyacittadaiva nivartante,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5283: kṣaṇamapi na syāditi sa eva virodhaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5292: tata eva hi sa krameṇa nivartate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5294: tathā nivṛttāyāmavidyāyāṃ karmasu cāviśeṣeṇārabdhakāryeṣvanārabdhakāryeṣu ca nivṛtteṣvārabdhavipākasaṃskārāccharīriṇaṃ bhoktāramiva cāyamātmānaṃ pratyetyābhāsamātreṇa vidvānapi,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5296_0: sa cāyamīdṛśaḥ sthitaprajño varṇitaḥ vītakāma ātmarūpasaṃtuṣṭo duḥkheṣu cchāyāmātrarūpeṣu
GSP33mbrahsiu:5297: yathā khalvaviduṣo mṛddāruracite stryādau viṣaye chāyāmātradarśanamabhiniveśavikalam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5298: tathā viduṣaḥ kṣīṇakarmāvidyasya [KKS_132] tatsaṃskāramātrāddarśanaṃ chāyāmātreṇaiva viṣayeṣu /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5299: tathā ca ‘tadyathāhinirlvayanī valmīke mṛtā pratyastā śayīta evamevedaṃ śarīram'iti viduṣaḥ śarīre 'nāsthāṃ darśayati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5308: tadanuvṛttau dehapāta eva na syāditi na dehapātottarakāle tadvipākasya chāyāmātreṇāpi darśanaṃ śakyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5309: yena hi karmaṇā yaccharīramārabdhaṃ tatraiva tadvipākaśeṣābhāsaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5325: pravṛttabhogānāṃ karmaṇāṃ pravṛttavegasyeṣoriva cakrasyeva vā na śakyaḥ pratibandhaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5337: viśuddhaṃ khalvātmānaṃ sākṣādanubhavato vipākābhāsastamaspṛśannakiñcitkaro bandhātmā pralīna eva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5339: tathāvadātamātmānaṃ jānato viparītaṃ vā khaḍgādiṣu śyāmādyābhāsa utpanno 'pi tattvadarśanādavakāśamalabhamānaḥ pravilīna eva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5340: tathā ca na tannibandhanena malinatvena śocatyātmānam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5344: karmaṇo vā śarīrasthitiḥ syātsaṃskārādvā, ko viśeṣaḥ?
GSP33mbrahsiu:5357: ‘yasyāṃ jāgrati bhūtāni sā niśā paśyato muneḥ'; /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5371: tathā ca taddravyaṃ paramārthatiktamivānavasitamādhuryamiva duḥkhāya bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5372: upāsanādinā sākṣātkṛtātmatattvasya tu virodhātsannapi prapañcāvabhāso nātmasaṃsparśī,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5382: dṛṣṭaṃ hi pramāṇānanusandhāne punaḥ sarpabhrāntyā rajjorbhayam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5388: ‘yathā puṣkarapalāśa āpo na śliṣyanta evamevaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyate'iti kartṛkarmapravibhāgasya vidyayā pravilayāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5393: na brahma śabdadhīgamyaṃ yadyaśakyo dhiyo vidhiḥ // MBs_2.108 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5405: api ca jñānaviśeṣavidhivādina ātmatattve prāmāṇyameva hīyata iti darśayati ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:5411: sattānvayāttu tatsiddhiḥ pratyuteti sa duṣyati // MBs_2.112 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5416: tadā sa svaniṣpattau paryavasitaḥ saha śabdena /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5423: iti padānāṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyena sambandhādanyathā vā vastutattvapratipattiriti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5426: kiṃ tu ‘evamidaṃ pratipattavyam'iti kartavyatāniṣṭhā na vastutattve pramāṇaṃ vṛttānteṣvivārthavādotthajñānam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5438: na hi ‘yajeta'ityukte yāgasya bhūtakālā vartamānakālā bhaviṣyatkālā vā sattā pratīyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5446: tathā ‘aṅgadī kuṇḍalī vyūḍhorasko devadattasya putro 'dhīte'ityadhyayanakriyāvatsarvo viśeṣaṇakalāpaḥ pratīyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5449: pratipattirhi viṣayaviṣeśaviśiṣṭā pramīyamāṇā na viṣayaviśeṣasya sadbhāvaṃ gamayati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5451: asau vāva loko gautamāgniḥ'iti yathā dyuprabhṛtiṣvanagnidṛṣṭeḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5453: nanu no viparītārthā dhīḥ pratītivirodhataḥ // MBs_2.114 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5459: viṣayarūpavyabhicāriṇi jñāne na tato viṣayaniścayaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5472: naitanna hi pravarteta śuktikāśakale tadā // MBs_2.115 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5479: na tatra yadi tadbuddhiḥ śuktikāśakale 'pi na /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5496: na ca smaryamāṇe rajate sā pravṛttiḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5498: na hi pratītimupagate 'pi vastuni yatra tasyāsaṃnidhistatra tenārthī pravartate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5527: na hīndriyasaṃyogasya darśanasya vā kaścidagraha upayogaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5537: ekatvameva smarataḥ prāgrūpaṃ śaśini sphuṭam // MBs_2.127 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5540: viparyayo na hi bhavedbhavanvā salile bhavet /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5560: asati tatra viśeṣajñāne ca dvayoḥ smṛtau saṃśaya eva syāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5566: sāmānyadarśane 'pi kadācidekāṃ koṭiṃ smarato na saṃśayo na viparyayaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5571: [KKS_140] api ca anyadeva smarataḥ pūrvarūpamekatvaṃ śaśini dvitvavibhramaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5578: na ca sarvā niyogena bhrāntiḥ sādṛśyabandhanā // MBs_2.129 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5580: kiñcitsādṛśyato hi syānna kaścittatra na bhramaḥ // MBs_2.130 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5582: bhrameṣu niyamo doṣādagrahe na bhrame yamaḥ // MBs_2.131 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5584: kathaṃ śvete pītabhramaḥ madhure vā tiktabhrāntiḥ?
GSP33mbrahsiu:5589: agrahamātre tu doṣavyāpāre kāmilādidoṣādbhrāntiniyamo na syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5603: sarvajñānāni mithyā ca prasajyante 'tra kalpane // MBs_2.137 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5610: sato tu viśeṣagrahaṇa indriyasaṃyukte sāmānyadarśane 'pi nāvivekaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5613: evamapi dvayoḥ smaraṇe na viparyayaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5618: tanna, anantadeśakālabhedāvagataṃ taddeśāvagataṃ ca dṛśyātsmaryamāṇaṃ viviktaṃ gamyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5627: svayameva sā svaviṣayaṃ dṛśyādvivinaktīti nāsti dṛśyamānasmaryamāṇayoravivekaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5628: yataḥ smarāmi iti jñānamanyadeva darśanasmaraṇavivekakāri smṛteḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5630: smṛtiḥ svaviṣayaṃ vivinakti vā na vā?
GSP33mbrahsiu:5654: na hi kasyacijjñānasya sarvātmanā vastu viṣaya iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5655: satyapi ca vivekajñāne pramāṇāntarād dvicandradiṅmohādyanugatirdṛṣṭeti nāgrahaṇamātraṃ viparyayaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5658: ye ca khyātī tu rajataścakṣuḥsaṃyuktavastunoḥ // MBs_2.140 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5664: na krame yaugapadye vā vivekamatirīdṛśī // MBs_2.143 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5680: viparītā tu khyātiḥ saṃnihitasya rajatatāmabhūtāṃ rajatasya vā saṃnihitatāmādarśayantī prasañjayati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5685: na hi ‘nedaṃ rajatam'iti rajatamātraṃ cakṣuḥsaṃyuktavastumātraṃ vā nirasyamānamavasyāmaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5686: kiṃ tu cakṣuḥsaṃyuktasya tu rajatatāṃ rajatasya vā cakṣusaṃyuktām /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5692: sarvajñānānāmagrahabādhenotpattau ca vivekajñānamātramidaṃ na prasaktapratiṣedharūpamiti pratītyanusāriṇo 'nurūpam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5730: smṛtatvenāviviktasya tathā viveke dharmiṇi pratipanne dharmāntarapratipanne dharmāntarapratipatterbādhakatvaṃ pūrvasyāśca bhrāntitvaṃ syātāmiti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5731: yaḥ pratītivirodhastu sa svadoṣa udāhṛtaḥ // MBs_2.149 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5733: 'idaṃ śuklaṃ rajatam'iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena pratīterātmopālambhaḥ parasminnāsajyate pratītivirodhaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5738: yo hi jñāyamāne 'rthe 'nyathāpi syādityanāśvāsastasya tenaiva jñānena tathātvaparicchedinotpattirnirudhyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5747: vyabhicāravato 'pi ca sitāsitādiṣu cakṣuṣaḥ sati tasmin prāmāṇyāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5748: na ca vyabhicāro bādhaheturdoṣavat prāmāṇyopaghātī kvacid dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5756: yatra tvavyabhicāro na kāraṇaṃ tatra vyabhicāre 'pi sati paricchede prāmāṇyamavivādam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5785: pratyakṣaṃ kāryamevaṃ ca hetunānumitaṃ bhavet // MBs_2.156 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5799: kasyacittvarpaṇaṃ tulyamatha tatra na tattathā // MBs_2.158 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5800: parasyāpi hi tatraivamatha tatra tathā sthiteḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5801: sarvatra syāttathābhāvaḥ syādevaṃ grahaṇe 'pi te // MBs_2.159 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5808: atha kāniciccakṣuḥsaṃyuktāni vastūni svena rūpeṇa gṛhyanta iti kasyacidagrahaṇe 'pi nānālambanatvam ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:5818: yathā khalu viparyayajñāne cakṣuḥsaṃprayuktavastusvabhāvanirapekṣatā dṛṣṭā samyagjñāne 'pi śaṅkyate jñānatvasāmānyāttathā cakṣuḥsaṃprayuktamapi vastu nāvikalarūpaṃ gṛhyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5839: adṛṣṭakalpanā yuktā na ca dṛṣṭasya saṃbhave /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5857: na hi tatrākiñcitkarasya tādarthyena kartavyatā yujyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5863: na hi tatra kiñcidakurvatprokṣaṇaṃ tadarthaṃ kṛtaṃ syādityevaṃ vidherevādṛṣṭasaṃskārasadbhāvasiddhiḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5865: nānyathā svargakāmasya yāgakartavyatāpratītiryujyate yadi na svargopāyo yāgaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5868: anuṣṭhito 'pi na svargakāmenānuṣṭhito bhavatīti kriyāviṣayādapi vidheḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvāvagamaḥ śābdaḥ ---
GSP33mbrahsiu:5873: jñānaṃ pradarśitaṃ na syādanyathā tadvidheḥ phalam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5874: layo nivartyo na tathā vikṣepo hi yathāsukhaḥ // MBs_2.166 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5878: na dṛṣṭamātrād dṛṣṭārthaṃ puruṣārthānugaṃ tu tat // MBs_2.168 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5908: yato nācchādikāyā avidyāyā nivṛttiḥ puruṣeṇārthyate tathā yathā vikṣepasya /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5910: layastu vividhaduḥkhanivṛtterasakṛdānandatvena śrutau gītaḥ pratyutārthanīyaḥ syāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5911: api ca viparyāsamanicchato 'vidyābheda eva na syāt,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5918: prājñaḥ kāraṇabaddhastu dvau tu turye na sidhyataḥ'; //
GSP33mbrahsiu:5924: abhinnasya vastuno 'pradeśasya grahaṇe tathābhāvasya cāgrahaṇātpṛthaktvena pratyavabhāsaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5926: yadi tāvadasamyaggrahaṇamātraṃ tadapaṭutvaṃ vā jñānasya kenaciddrūpeṇa vā grahaṇam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5928: tatra dūrasthe sūkṣme ca bhavatyapaṭu jñānaṃ sāmānyajñānam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5930: na ca kiñcijjñānaṃ sarvātmanārthasya grāhakamiti sarvajñānamithyātvāpātaḥ /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5942: yadi yathā pṛthagbhūtamaprakāśamānaikatvaṃ prakāśate tathaikamapyātmatattvamagṛhyamāṇaikatvaṃ prakāśata iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5953: tadasat, agrahaṇasyābhāvasya svarūpeṇa pararūpeṇa vā grahaṇānabhyupagamāt /
GSP33mbrahsiu:5955: abhinne ca bhedābhimānaṃ parityajyābhedāgrahaṇe bhedagrahābhimānamūrīkurvatā kiṃ parihṛtaṃ syāt?
GSP33mbrahsiu:5966: yathā hi viśuddhamadvaitamātmānaṃ pratipadyamānastathābhūto na śokena saṃspṛśyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:5978: paramārthe hi prapañcaśūnyatve pratyakṣādīni pramāṇāni bādhyeran /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6010: idaṃ sarvaṃ yadayamātmā'iti śabdasamarpitarūpasya tasya jñānaṃ vidhīyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:6013: jñānaṃ yadi ca dṛṣṭārthaṃ prāptaṃ dṛṣṭata eva tat /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6018: na rūpasiddhaye tāvadyataḥ kartavyatā vidheḥ // MBs_2.176 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:6022: tadupāye tvavijñāte vidhinā sa pravartyatām // MBs_2.178 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:6030: tasya tadvyarthamiti vidhiśatenāpi sa na pravartyate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6039: tatrāpi hi niyamādṛṣṭaṃ phalaṃ taṇḍuleṣu tatpraṇāḍyā vā pradhānapūrvasiddhiradṛṣṭaiva /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6050: tasmādalaukike 'pahatapāpmādirūpa ātmatattve śabdātpratipanne tasya sākṣājjñānaṃ prati tadanubhavopāyatvātsvayameva puruṣasyābhimukhyaṃ bhavatīti vyarthaṃ tadvidhānam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:6051: yathāścaryabhūte kasmiṃścidarthe āgamātpratipanne tasya sākṣātkaraṇe svayamevonmukhatvaṃ bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6053: tadevaṃ jñāne niyogānupapatterniyoge ca vasturūpāvagame prāmāṇyāyogādvyavasthitātmatattvapratipattimicchatā śabdānna tasya niyogānupraveśo 'bhyupagantavya iti /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6068: iti ceto dhārayet'iti vivakṣitatvācchravaṇādanyadanucintanaṃ dhyānaṃ pratyayapravāho vidhīyate karmavadevāmṛtatvaphalam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6074: tathā ca ‘vijñāya prajñāṃ kurvīta'ityātmatattvavijñānasya siddhatāṃ darśayati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6084: iti tu na sakalaviśeṣātigātmatattvānucintanaṃ vidhīyate tadbhāvaphalam,
GSP33mbrahsiu:6118: ‘aitadātmyamidaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyaṃ sa ātmā tattvamasi'iti bhūta eva paryavasitaṃ vākyam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6125: tathā ca ‘tattu samanvayāt'iti codanālakṣaṇāddharmāttuśabdena viśeṣyaṃ brahma samanvayagamyamuktam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6126: samanvayo hi padārthānāṃ saṃsargo viniyogastato brahma gamyate,
GSP33mbrahsiu:6136: sā copariṣṭādeva nirasiṣyate bahu cātra vaktavyamityalaṃ prasaṅgena /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6143: evaṃ tāvatpratipattikartavyatāprāmāṇyavyājena yairaprāmāṇyamuktaṃ tatpratibodhanāya kṛtaḥ prayatnaḥ;
GSP33mbrahsiu:6155: tatra padārtha eva viśiṣṭo vākyārtho bhavati /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6161: tatrātyantāparidṛṣṭabrahmādyarthapramāṇābhimateṣu vākyeṣu tadvācīni padāni syuḥ, na vā /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6162: yadi na santi na ta itaraiḥ saṃsṛjyeran na bhidyeranniti na teṣāṃ prameyāḥ loṣṭādivat /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6164: tathāpi tairadhigatasaṃbandhairna pratipādyeran apratipannāśca na viśiṣṭavākyārthapratipattihetavaḥ;
GSP33mbrahsiu:6177: sarvasyaiva hi vākyasyānadhigato viśeṣa eva prameyaḥ tathā kāraṇasāmānyaṃ vā satsāmānyaṃ vā ‘
GSP33mbrahsiu:6205: yat khalu vākyaṃ na puruṣaṃ kvaciddhitasādhane pravartayati ahitasādhanācca [KKS_158] nivartayati,
GSP33mbrahsiu:6216: api cājñānataḥ śokī duḥkhī jīvaḥ prakāśate // MBs_4.6 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:6221: na ca pravṛttiniṣṭhatvaṃ tathāsmin kena vāryate /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6222: jñeyasya puruṣārthatvaṃ tatra cedatra tatsamam // MBs_4.9 //
GSP33mbrahsiu:6238: yadyapi ca saṃskārāttasyānuvṛttistathāpi śābdajñānamanusaṃtanvato viduṣo na pūrvavadbhavati nivartate cātyantāya /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6239: dṛṣṭā ca jñānotpattereva puruṣārthatā kvacit kutūhalākulitānāmajñāte'rthe /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6246: pratyakṣādijñeyaṃ hi siddhaṃ vastu puruṣārthaḥ salilādiḥ,
GSP33mbrahsiu:6249: atrāpi ca śabdaprameyaṃ svayameva brahma puruṣārtho jarādivividhāśivopaśamāt paramānandaprakāśatvācca suprasannam /
GSP33mbrahsiu:6253: tattve tādātmyajñāne ca tathābhāvāt viśvāśivopaśamāt paramaśivabhāvācca paripūrṇaḥ puruṣārtho āpto bhavati /
